name: bhagwanti verma block
raw_text:
BHAGWANTI S VERMA
Block no 88, Gulab Vatika Society, Old Padra Road, Nr Tandelja, Baroda-390020
Contact: 09662513510  E-mail: bhagwanti.verma@yahoo.com
MARKET RESEARCH ~ STATISTICAL ANALYST~ SAS ANALYST


PROFILE:
Exposure to global processes and teamwork across various locations and cultures desirable.
Proficiency with a deep learning framework such as TensorFlow or Keras Proficiency with Python and basic libraries for machine learning such as scikit-learn and pandas 
Expertise in visualizing and manipulating big datasets Proficiency with OpenCV 
Ability to select hardware to run an ML model with the required latency 
Responsibilities Understanding business objectives and developing models that help to achieve them, along with metrics to track their progress Managing available resources such as hardware, data, and personnel so that deadlines are met 
Analyzing the ML algorithms that could be used to solve a given problem and ranking them by their success probability 
Exploring and visualizing data to gain an understanding of it, then identifying differences in data distribution that could affect performance when deploying the model in the real world 
Verifying data quality, and/or ensuring it via data cleaning 
Supervising the data acquisition process if more data is needed 
Finding available datasets online that could be used for training 
Defining the pre-processing or feature engineering to be done on a given dataset Defining data augmentation pipelines Training models and tuning their hyperparameters 
Key Excel in resolving client queries with faster & better solutions through training and desk sit root cause analysis, systems and process improvements proven to increase efficiency, customer satisfaction.
Possess a very strong understanding of the specific business processes being addressed, along with the ability to bridge the gap between the business & Client requirement. 
Proficient in Creating, Joining and Merging Dataset using SAS Base and Proc SQL
Strong interpersonal/communication skills (oral and written) and confidence to work with Analytics group and all levels of management.
Self-motivated with the ability to make decisions in the absence of detailed instructions.
Customer focused, highly successful in building relationships with key decision makers, seizing control of critical problem areas and delivering on customer commitments
Rich experience in delivering optimal results & Ethical value to students. Demonstrated capabilities in establishing good academics results along with discipline of the institute.


Core Competencies:
Python ML&AISAS Base9 Business Analyst Training & Development  Team HandlingTeam Management Cross Functional Coordination


WORK EXPERIENCE

TATA CONSUTANCY SERVICES							              Jan 2011- May 2019
Business Process Analyst

Had to learn different process of market Research Business to understand the complete flow of Retail Measurement, this was helping in identifying cause effect on final deliverables.
Had to identify, investigate and co-ordinate the resolution of data, process or product related queries.
Creating Standard Operating procedure for all the end users to drive business smoothly and to reduce quality escapes
Had to drive convergence for INPUT Validation process across different countries
Need to work on SQL in making queries and providing desired output to clients.
Demonstrated experience in modeling data quality data tracing data mapping statistical analysis econometrics and / or data mining preferred.
Able to work with large volumes of data from disparate sources.
Had to support for Onshore as well as offshore users for any knowledge base difficulties/questions
Taking lead in transition(off shoring) of new Countries for the existing process 
Handling a team of 4 for the data validation department, assigning work to them and improving their skills and efficiency according to their knowledge
Communicating with clients to understand work in more better way so that we can deliver it on/before deadlines
Working for data validation team, this is dealing with retailer data for the market research. Validating and correcting the retailer data, this will be used in preparation of final reports to the client
Need to get engaged in different projects which was helping in increasing productivity and quality of the final outputs, Training new associates/experienced associates to improve productivity, Root cause analysis





GOVERNMENT ENGINEERING COLLEGE 								     2005- 2010 
Visiting Lecturer

I was working as a Visiting Lecturer for mathematics from 2005 to 2009 at Government engineering college Dahod.
I am completely acquainted with the math’s syllabus of GTU(Gujarat Tech Uni)
My job profile there was to complete the syllabus in time. Set the Internal Exam question paper as well to assess them.
I was also given the responsibilities of assessing the University Answer paper of the entire semester student.
I was teaching Math’s to all the semester student of Engineering College 


ACADEMIA

Master of Science (Math’s), 2005
Sardar Patel University, V. V. Nagar, Gujarat,	

Bachelor of Science (Math’s), 2003
Sardar Patel University, V. V. Nagar, Gujarat,

SAS (Base SAS 9)
Certified SAS Programmer

SAS Tools: 	SAS/SQL, SAS/macro and SAS/ODS.
Version: 	SAS 9.1.3
